channel.title: Pwn Stars
channel.description:
[center][size=50pt]=PwN=[/size][/center] [color=navy]
[center]I'm starting a COUNTER-STRIKE: SOURCE clan. If anyone can host a server, that'll be great, but in the mean time we'll be gypsies :P.[/center]
[b][size=12pt]Reqs:[/size] Must have skills in COUNTER-STRIKE: SOURCE Must be active (twice a week; if you are too busy or going on vacation, etc, please notify me)[/b]
[b][size=12pt]Rules:[/size] 1. Respect all members 2. Play with fairness (Don't shoot team members in FF lol) 3. Follow the server rules 4. Don't use any cheats that will bring you an unfair advantage to the game 5. Always have your clan tag on. (=PwN=) 6. If any of the owners aren't on for an event, co-leader takes charge.[/b]
[hr]
[size=15pt]The Clan:[/size]
Leader(s): - Ninja Nub (Daniel) - (This is reserved for the hoster, if we get one)
Co-Leaders: - Cruzer (nomsain) - Pigjosh1 (Jacob/Josh; IRL friend)
Noobs: - Don't have username yet, but his name is ryan (IRL friend) - - - - - - - - - [b][size=12pt] Application:[/size][/b] [code] IRL Name: Steam ID: How long have you played COUNTER-STRIKE: SOURCE?: Rate your skills 1-10 (10 being the highest): Have you read and agreed to the rules?: Will you try to be active?: [/code]
[center][b] Remember, if you can host a server on your computer, please post here! You will get a leader spot![/b][/center]

item.title: Pwn Stars
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

How would you know if I’m good or not? For your information, I’ve been playing CS:S for 3 years and no one asked for your comments. They don’t help anyone at all. You need to be muted, all you do is go around and insulting me for no reason.

Read full topic

item.title: Pwn Stars
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

It’s nothing like hosting a moparserver. You’d make a terrible leader because no one respects you. I doubt you’re good at CS at all, considering it’s a CS:S clan. Come back when you have some form of a skill at all.

Read full topic

item.title: Pwn Stars
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

He never joined. And I’m not going to accept him lol. You can’t host a CS:S server without CS:S. Plus, he can’t develop good skills in a couple of days.

Read full topic

item.title: Pwn Stars
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

On another topic

I’ve never played the game in my life… Is this going to be more trouble than I originally thought?

You joined a clan for a game that you have never played?

Seems a bit silly to me :P.

Read full topic

item.title: Pwn Stars
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

[center][size=50pt]=PwN=[/size][/center]
[color=navy]

[center]I’m starting a COUNTER-STRIKE: SOURCE clan. If anyone can host a server, that’ll be great, but in the mean time we’ll be gypsies :P.[/center]

[size=12pt]Reqs:[/size]
Must have skills in COUNTER-STRIKE: SOURCE
Must be active (twice a week; if you are too busy or going on vacation, etc, please notify me)

[b][size=12pt]Rules:[/size]

  1. Respect all members
  2. Play with fairness (Don’t shoot team members in FF lol)
  3. Follow the server rules
  4. Don’t use any cheats that will bring you an unfair advantage to the game
  5. Always have your clan tag on. (=PwN=)
  6. If any of the owners aren’t on for an event, co-leader takes charge.[/b]

[hr]

[size=15pt]The Clan:[/size]

Leader(s):

  • Ninja Nub (Daniel)
  • (This is reserved for the hoster, if we get one)

Co-Leaders:

  • Cruzer (nomsain)
  • Pigjosh1 (Jacob/Josh; IRL friend)

Noobs:

  • Don’t have username yet, but his name is ryan (IRL friend)

[size=12pt]
Application:[/size]

IRL Name:
Steam ID:
How long have you played COUNTER-STRIKE: SOURCE?:
Rate your skills 1-10 (10 being the highest):
Have you read and agreed to the rules?:
Will you try to be active?:

[center]
Remember, if you can host a server on your computer, please post here! You will get a leader spot![/center]
